EmailTemplate.subject: Simple made Possible in ATM Procurement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
When you buy a new product, you want it to be a simple transaction. At NCR we’re committed to making simple, possible.
So with our NCR SelfServ™ Preferred Offers program we make it simpler and easier to buy our products. Through pre-configured and ready to ship units, we’re able to rationalise ordering through NCR. We can even offer you more functionality than you may have previously taken. We also offer expedited lead-times with Preferred Offers – ensuring you maintain uptime and availability of your ATM fleet. Which is critical in the current climate.
Read our Ebook to learn more about NCR Preferred Offers and the configurations available. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
